item.title: Blog Migraiton
item.description: I decided to move my weblog from Micro.blog to a self-hosted static website. While I enjoy the platform, I don’t really use anything but a custom domain feature.

item.title: Clean Slate
item.description: Over time, I created and abandoned many repositories on GitHub. Removing them completely is an involved process, though. They really want to make sure you are intentional and know the consequences. Of course, this is great, but not when you need to delete a dozen of projects. That’s 6 times more clicks! Here is the solution I came up with ‚Äî https://clean-slate.surge.sh It allows selecting multiple repositories and deleting them without confirmations.

item.title: Monthly Subscription
item.description: Every time my sends a payment notification, I remember I have a blog. Does this happen to anyone else? üòÖ

item.title: Recap
item.description: Since the fucking war started, I was unable to pay for and publish on Micro.blog. I tried Publii as an alternative, but unfortunately, it is not that convenient.

item.title: March 3, 2022
item.description: Honestly, I never thought I‚Äôll be preparing for fleeing from my home and country one day. Now that Russia is nearly declaring a state of war, instead of a ‚Äúspecial military operation‚Äù it becomes a top priority to make sure my family is safe üôè

item.title: Monochrome
item.description: I recall someone said that monochrome picture is less attractive for human eye. Why don‚Äôt I try reducing screen time by switching my phone to black and white? My first 30 day experiment has now begun‚Ä¶ üßë‚Äçüî¨

item.title: Address Books Are Still an Option
item.description:
I used to consider contact management tools something insignificant. Why spend time meticulously updating information about people when it is displayed on their IM profiles?

Well, it is‚Ä¶ until the service goes down.

item.title: IELTS Reading Life Hack
item.description: I‚Äôve been into IELTS for the last week. While doing some reading with the latest preparation materials from Cambridge Press, I found highlighting relevant parts the most helpful strategy for me. It becomes easier to navigate a text with every other highlighted piece. As the result, I make 1-2 mistakes instead of 4-6 without it. I was lucky to find an application of Pareto principle to my work here.

item.title: Mock Ielts Results
item.description: Well, the results came in, 7.5-6-7-7 üôÇ To be honest, I‚Äôm pretty happy because I just went for it without any preparation. Now the plan is to fix Reading and make other ‚Äúlucky‚Äù 7s more ‚Äúconfident‚Äù.

item.title: Mock IELTS
item.description: Today I took a mock IELTS. It looks like I will need at least 6.5 for all sections except Listening, which should be 7.5. The results should come in 48 hours, so now I‚Äôm just waiting üò¥

item.title: Good Morning
item.description: It looks even more hazy in person Photograph of a cityscape from the 15th floor

item.title: Therapist Tomorrow
item.description: I‚Äôm looking forward to talking to my therapist tomorrow. So far, it has not been a walk in the park, but I know the process is rewarding, so‚Ä¶ Is there any better time to heal some wounds than now? üòá

item.title: One Typed Page
item.description: A web project where everyone can publish a photograph of their type üìù and read what others are sharing. It is wonderful how unique and personal the submissions are üòá A scanned copy typewritten text

item.title: Typewriter Is Fine
item.description: Today I realized my typewriter‚Äôs line spacing is absolutely fine. I just need to pull that line-by-line/continuous switch all the way to the right ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

item.title: Journal
item.description: I spent the whole day working with my journal üìî writing down thoughts helps to save ideas from being forgotten, and further reflection brings major discoveries ‚ú®üî≠

item.title: Don‚Äôt fight bad habits
item.description: You shouldn‚Äôt attempt eliminating bad habits because they are imperfect solutions to a problem you experience. You may even be grateful for them, as they helped you carry on until now‚Ä¶ üòá Once you came up with a better one, you won‚Äôt feel any resistance adopting new behaviour ‚ú® Or even solve the issue once and for all üí™

item.title: Oh, hi there
item.description: This would be my first post on Micro.blog platform ü•≥ I had successfully wasted my trial period, but I can feel a great adventure ahead! You take care ‚ù§Ô∏è
